Summary: 3 orange, glowing orbs moved silently across the horizon before changing direction and moving south. Each was approx. the same altitude and spaced evenly apart. approx. 30 sec.
trends: There has been one other sighting in South Bruce Peninsula
There were no other sightings in South Bruce Peninsula on or around May 19th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsA friend and myself were standing on my deck at approx. 9pm. when I noticed an orange orb travelling horizontally moving eastward. It disappeared behind a tree line and we lost sight when another came into sight from where the first had been spotted. This one also moved in the same flight pattern at about the same height and speed as the first. There was no variation in the speed or intensity of the light and it too passed behind the treelike and out of visual. It was then I went for my camera and sure enough a third orb came from the same area and followed the same flight path before disappearing behind the tree line. I ran to the other side of the deck where I could see the orb had changed direction and was moving south.
